detaileddescription.para: Title: P03006: Investigation of potential improvements to the TRE 7 stock assessment

Principal Investigator: Terese Kendrick Researchers: Mark Maunder Status: Work Completed The Ministry of Fisheries research project "TRE 2001/02 Stock assessment of trevally in TRE 7" was completed by Trophia and included an analysis of CPUE and stock assessment modelling. The results were presented to the Pelagic Fisheries Assessment Working Group in February 2003. In reviewing the results of the project, the WG identified two areas where additional work was needed:

The high inter-annual variability in CPUE The potential for age-specific mortality The New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries (MFish) accepted a proposal from Trophia to investigate these two areas further.
A Final Research Report is held by the Ministry of Fisheries.
Maunder, M. & Kendrick, T.H. (2004). Investigation of potential improvements to the TRE 7 stock assessment. Unpublished Final Research Report for project MOF2003-01D . 48 p.
This project is funded by the New Zealand Ministry of Fisheries Project MOF2003-01D
